page.title: 05Rykneld swimming club
page.content: I belong to the swimming club,called Ryknelds,at the leisure centre and people round this area also belong.It is held on a Wednesday and Friday from 7.15 p.m.to 8.15 p.m.At the swimming club we have galas, swim races and do life saving. We can win trophies and medals.I have got my bronze,silver and gold awards.When we start it is Â£8 per year and each time I go it is 30p.When l started l could not swim, then l swam my 10 metres, so l moved up to the other half of the little pool.I swam my 30 metres and went into the big pool.I have moved from the 2nd lane up to the 5th lane.It is hard work in the 5th lane.We swim 25 lengths as a warm up. Altogether we swim about 100 lengths each time. We have diving competitions,and race against children in the fourth and fifth lanes.I love swimming.
